docna.cdata!:
Turkey - Karakaya Hydropower Project : Loan
            1844 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Turkey - Karakaya Hydropower
            Project : Loan 1844 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

18210314.admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The Karakaya Hydropower Project will add
            1800 MW of additional capacity to the Turkish power system,
            with an average yearly generation of 7750 GWh of relatively
            low-cost hydropower, thus contributing to reduced dependence
            on more expensive energy sources and savings in foreign
            exchange. It comprises a 173 metres high, concrete
            arch-gravity dam which will create 5.62 k
